response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its immense value to you, we believe it's only fair to offer it at a price that reflects its true worth while ensuring a profitable transaction for us. We propose to sell the product to you for $950,000. This price not only ensures a significant return on our investment but also allows you to enjoy substantial savings compared to its market value of $1,200,000. We look forward to your positive response and the chance to facilitate this transaction. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out.", "product_price": 950000}
